com.cleo.connector.api.interfaces

Class ConnectorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cleo.connector.api.interfaces.ConnectorBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConnectorAuth, ConnectorClient, ConnectorReceiver

    public abstract class ConnectorBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Extended by connectors which are not command-processing clients (e.g. auth connector or receiver connector or event-processing client)
